ca.mcgill.ecse428.restoguys.connoisseur.persistance

Class Persistance

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse428.restoguys.connoisseur.persistance.Persistance

  • public class Persistance
extends java.lang.Object
    This static class provides the application-wide tools for writing and reading current/previous GameManager states with XStream.
